meta.description: Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse at London Heathrow Airport (LHR), Terminal 3. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse

location.terminalDirections: Located in the Upper Class Wing.

lounge.description: Relaxed, friendly, luxurious - the Heathrow Clubhouse offers the ultimate airport experience. Abandon the hustle and bustle of the airport and retreat to the tranquil and luxurious sanctuary of the Heathrow Clubhouse.

reviews.content: This is the best lounge I’ve ever experienced. The service is beyond amazing. The staff truly goes above and beyond to accommodate. The food table service made to order. Highly recommend.
Large and spacious lounge. Great food and service. Definitely a much nicer lounge than most in the US. It's my first international lounge so I'm not sure how it compares. Looking forward to the spa!
A very nice lounge, first time as a Delta Diamond member that I have had sitdown menu service.
Best lounge I’ve ever been to! Service awesome, great food, wide range of food and drinks and where else can you even get your nails done at a lounge - wish they had this one at every airport!!!
Out of every lounge I’ve been to, this is the best best. Absolutely fantastic. Complimentary massages and haircuts, showers, steam rooms, great food, business centre. Worth the price.
Amazing lounge - it’s like a small village. Plenty of seating, multiple food and drink offerings, complimentary spa treatments. My favourite lounge ever.
Wonderful - relaxed and stylish. The spa is great! I got a shampoo and blowout and my daughter got a (complimentary) manicure. Food is solid and service is excellent.
The best lounge I’ve ever been to. Get a manicure, eat fantastic food, relax. Check out the roof deck.
Crowded but I found some seating. Great opportunities for plane spotting, pool playing, and good menu choices. Showers were excellent as well as the spa treatments.
Give yourself time. This is not a lounge to run in and out. Table service is at a relaxed pace, reasonably priced spa service, and good food. Enjoyed my time here!
Great lounge. It is the best I've personally been to. It's not perfect, but there is a salon and you can get a complimentary hair wash. Silly, but nice. Pool table as well.
Maybe I have become a lounge snob, but I just was not dazzled with the Clubhouse. Food good but a bit slow. Minimal self serve options (been waiting for a cappuccino for 10 minutes). Too crowded.
One of the best lounges I have ever been to!
Have been regularly to all of LHR's lounges. Cathay Pacific First is great but still second best to the Virgin Clubhouse. Table service, always spa availability (contrast BA) and lovely people. Yay!
This has got to be the best lounge in the UK, the staff are so polite and the atmosphere is amazing, I would definitely move in as it's the best lounge at Heathrow.
Phenomenal service and food. Every staff member is truly committed to making your experience amazing. Easy to eat and drink $100 worth. Facilities are gorgeous. Worth booking solely to experience!
This is the best lounge by far. Stellar service is Virgin Atlantic's signature.

By miles, this is the BEST lounge I have been in the world. I REALLY wish Virgin flew more places as this lounge alone would get me buying a ticket. Bit busier since Delta joined but still A TRENDSETTER.
Amazing lounge, fantastic spa despite limited complimentary treatments. Genuinely excellent food selection and hugely spacious. Roof terrace is a treat on a good day.
My only gripe would be that I kept finding seats next to air vents that were chilly. I enjoyed a nice massage before the flight and a delicious breakfast. I think this has ruined me to other lounges.
LOVE the sassy, but friendly staff and the food - very tasty! I got a free haircut as well, how cool?!?!
Terrific place to hang. Great food and drink selection. Plenty of different seating areas and activities like pool available. Nice looking all around. You won't want to leave.
Very very good lounge and great atmosphere. Great selection of food and probably better than CX lounges in HKG in some respects. The first class limo entrance is great for avoiding the crowds.
Absolutely love the feel of this lounge. Spacious, clean, fun, busy but not overly full or noisy. Love the complimentary facial. Arcade tables were a plus.
Outstanding Int'l Clubhouse. Different seats for whatever your mood.
Wow!  Only slight negative, I have yet to get a haircut. Spots are always taken, even the one time I was 3 hours early....
I don't want to be one to moan about how great things used to be but.... What happened to the food? I used to be spoiled for choice but the menu is so hoity-toity; nothing appealing at all.
Fantastic lounge. Great bar, spa, restaurant & seating area. Spa treatments get booked up so head there as soon as you arrive if you want to experience.
Just superb. Everything you hope for and more. The benchmark for all other airlines.
Best lounge I've been in for some time. Great food, great drinks, great service. Gets a touch busy, but staff are always happy to help find you a spot. Shoeshine guy is awesome. Well worth the extra.
Personal, attentive service and amenities. An example of what a lounge should be. Several discrete areas within the facility allows choice of quiet vs. greater activity. Food & beverages superb!
One of the nicest lounges I've been in. Full service, good food and selection, roomy, all together excellent
Rightfully award winning, puts BA lounges to shame. Cocktails, showers, haircuts, massages, food from formal, through tapas to a great deli-dog. Worth getting to very very early for your flight!
Simply superb. My heart sinks when my flight is called because this is an excellent place to spend time. Get a haircut, do a spa treatment, visit the cocktail bar, have a meal, and surf the web here.
This lounge has a great bar, spa, barbers, shoe shining, and food. It's better than the Concorde lounge, but because it's so large/open, it's sometimes noisy.
Probably one of the best lounges ever. It exceeded my expectations, and you literally can want for nothing in this lounge.
I have been through this lounge countless times and it is always a pleasure. Fantastic bar, great service, as well as ample room to relax, work, or play. Shower rooms are great, as is the hot tub.
As a regular user of this lounge over the years, I can attest that this place keeps up with the times and services, including great massages and haircuts! Always try and arrive with time to spare.

location.terminalDirections: Departure Level, after Duty Free, Lounge Area H
Exit to the right after the Terminal 3 Customs Hall, take the stairs or lift to Level 2.

otherLounges.name: American Airlines International First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control, exit Duty Free Area and turn right toward Lounge Area H.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22
Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.
Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.
Located near Gate 9, lounge is signposted as "Lounge D" on the right hand side.
Follow the signs to 'Lounge F' towards Gates 13-22, proceed up one level via the lift or stairs.

The Lounge is in Terminal 3 Area A. After you go through security, follow Flight Connection route Area A,  access point in the main shopping and dining area to Level 2 accessible by taking the elevators.
Zone E, Level 1, along corridor with Gates 1-11
Zone B, located in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11, next to the Cathay Pacific Lounge.
5 minute walk from customs, just off the Arrivals Hall
